Trinity:

Trinity nodded crying and she ran where Nightlight was.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Lambda::
>     She shrunk into Burning Hammer's embrace at the sounds of the 
explosions. 
>  She stood tall only moments before Trinity entered the room.  
After hearing 
> her brief explanation Lambda was in shock.  "Take us to her 
Trinity.  And 
> quickly."
